mapper.select: select po.post_id , ca.category_name , (select count(*) from file_info fi where fi.post_id = po.post_id) as file_count , po.title , po.post_content , po.writer , po.write_dt , po.update_dt from post_info po inner join category_info ca on (po.category_id = ca.category_id) where po.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: insert into post_info (category_id, title, post_content, writer, password) values (#{categoryId},#{title},#{postContent},#{writer},#{password})
